text.lore.reforge_icon.wait.tips1: Place Â§ethe item to be modifiedÂ§r in the Â§c"Red"Â§r slot

musee.transmutation.main1:
Â§6Â§lÂ§nTransmutationÂ§r 
 > Transmuting Â§6a weaponÂ§r will allow you to increase Â§its qualityÂ§r while Â§akeeping its spellsÂ§r, thus increasing its damage. 
 Quality progression:
Â§7CommonÂ§r> Â§aUncommonÂ§r> Â§9RareÂ§r> Â§5EpicÂ§r> Â§6LegendaryÂ§r> Â§3Mythicâš Â§r
musee.transmutation.main2: > You will need to place Â§6the weaponÂ§r Â§7(or another soul stone)Â§r in the center of the structure with four Â§bsoul stonesÂ§r of the Â§esame qualityÂ§f around it to start the process.
musee.transmutation.myth:
Â§3Â§lÂ§nMythic WeaponsÂ§r 
 Â§3The mythic weaponÂ§r is the final stage of the weapon.
A Â§3mythic weaponÂ§r cannot be Â§ereforgedÂ§r, Â§etransmutedÂ§r, or Â§erecyclededÂ§r.
 Â§4âš Â§r Â§cEnsure you have Â§nthe desired statisticsÂ§c before reaching this final stage.Â§r
musee.reforge.main1:
Â§6Â§lÂ§nReforge a WeaponÂ§r 
 > For a sum of Â§9EtherÂ§r , it allows you to Â§ereset a spell rollÂ§r on the weapon while Â§akeepingÂ§r its quality this time.
musee.reforge.main2: Note that Â§areforgingÂ§f a weapon costs more and more Â§9EtherÂ§r  but Â§btransmutingÂ§r the weapon Â§aresetsÂ§r the reforge cost.
musee.reforge.main3: Â§4âš Â§c A Â§3mythic weaponÂ§rÂ§c cannot be reforged!
musee.sell.main1: > Â§eSellingÂ§f a weapon will Â§4destroyÂ§f it and grant you a sum of Ether 
musee.destroy.main1: > Â§bRecyclingÂ§f a weapon will Â§4destroyÂ§f it to extract the soul stone Â§c(There is a chance the process may fail)
info.musee.altar.nothing: A destroyed altar that cannot be activated.
info.musee.altar.defense: The defense altar will trigger waves of monsters. Defeat them to retrieve your equipment.
info.musee.altar.attack: Challenge and defeat the boss of the attack altar to receive your loot.
info.musee.altar.traque: When the hunt altar is activated, you must find and kill your target to continue your adventure and enjoy its rewards.
info.musee.altar.sacrifice: Sacrifice maximum health points to get what you deserve.
info.musee.altar.luxe: An extremely rare altar that requires nothing but luck.
sign.chest.description:
Â§b- Adventurer's Chests -
Â§fThese chests are the best way to equip yourself effectively during your adventure, whether it's with Â§bgemsÂ§r, Â§econsumablesÂ§r, or Â§aarmorÂ§r. Will you find them?
sign.healthshop.description:
Â§c- The Dispenser -
Â§fThis dispenser will refill Â§ayour potions  Â§fin exchange for a bit of gold . Â§eThe number of refills depends on the number of playersÂ§r in your party.
 - Cost: 50
info.musee.weapons.sword: A basic sword, practical for close combat.
sword.spell.sharpness: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nSharpness Â§7>Â§f Deals more damage with each attack
sword.spell.shield: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nShield Â§7>Â§f Allows you to protect yourself a certain number of times before breaking
sword.spell.life_steal: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nLife Steal Â§7>Â§f Ability to regenerate health upon attack
sword.spell.backdash: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nBackdash Â§7>Â§f Move backward while facing enemies
info.musee.weapons.silversword: The famous silver sword. Specialized in eliminating monsters of all kinds.
silversword.spell.raredmg: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nSpecialist Â§7>Â§f Deals extra damage to crowned monsters
silversword.spell.avarice: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nAvarice Â§7>Â§f Gives a chance to obtain more Â§6gold coinsÂ§f  upon monster death
silversword.spell.buveuse: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nAmplification Â§7>Â§f Consecutive monster kills grant additional damage
silversword.spell.shield: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nShield Â§7>Â§f Move backward while facing enemies
silversword.spell.backdash: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nBackdash Â§7>Â§f Allows you to protect yourself a certain number of times before breaking
info.musee.weapons.dagger: Sleek and lightweight, the dagger is perfect for executing enemies.
dagger.spell.exec: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nExecution Â§7>Â§f Increases damage when hitting enemies from behind
dagger.spell.poison: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nPoison Â§7>Â§f Â§aPoisonsÂ§f the target hit
dagger.spell.trap: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nTrap Â§7>Â§f Places a trap on the ground, blocking enemies walking over it
dagger.spell.vamp: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nVampirism Â§7>Â§f Regenerates a small amount of health upon attack
dagger.spell.invisible: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nInvisibility Â§7>Â§f Renders you invisible and removes the fire effect
dagger.spell.shuriken: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nShuriken Â§7>Â§f The shuriken is a traditional Japanese throwing weapon used in shurikenjutsu.
info.musee.weapons.longsword: Heavy and long like my...uh, pardon. The longsword is a sure bet. Don't doubt it.
longsword.spell.spin: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nSpin Â§7>Â§f Deals damage in the surrounding area
longsword.spell.block: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nBlock Â§7>Â§f Â§aBlocksÂ§f an attack for a short duration (the more precise you are, the greater the blocking bonuses)
longsword.spell.cleave: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nBleeding Â§7>Â§f Applies Â§cbleedingÂ§f to the monster in front of you
longsword.spell.bleed: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nWound Â§7>Â§f Applies Â§cbleedingÂ§f if the attack is chargedÂ§fÂ§r
info.musee.weapons.axe: The battle axe will split your enemies without difficulty (and wood if needed).
axe.spell.berzerk: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nBerzerk Â§7>Â§f After a short channel, consumes health points to increase the player's strength
axe.spell.grab: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nHook Â§7>Â§f Pulls monsters toward you
axe.spell.charge: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nSlashing Â§7>Â§f Jumps while inflicting Â§cbleedingÂ§f damage
axe.spell.rage: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nRage Â§7>Â§f Gives a chance to increase attack Â§battack speedÂ§f after killing a monster
info.musee.weapons.masse: Nothing like a good club to make progress in hostile terrain.
masse.spell.stun: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nStun Â§7>Â§f Â§aStunsÂ§f the target for a certain time
masse.spell.anti_projectile: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nAnti Projectile Â§7>Â§f Eliminates incoming projectiles in the area
masse.spell.aoe_slow: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nSlowdown Â§7>Â§f Slows enemies around you
masse.spell.dmg_stun: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nDamage on Stun Â§7>Â§f Additional damage on a Â§astunnedÂ§f target
masse.spell.par_stun: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nParry Stun Â§7>Â§f Stuns the target by parrying with the shield
masse.spell.par_regen: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nRegenerating Parry Â§7>Â§f Regenerates health by parrying with the shield
info.musee.weapons.hammer: This heavy hammer is an excellent adventure companion.
hammer.spell.stun: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nArmor Breaker Â§7>Â§f Increases damage during a Â§echarged attackÂ§fÂ§r Â§7(Stackable)Â§f
hammer.spell.dash: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nCharge Â§7>Â§f Makes a long forward jump
hammer.spell.armor_breaker: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nArea Shock Â§7>Â§f Causes a seismic shock that slows enemies inside
hammer.spell.jump: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nStunning Jump Â§7>Â§f Jumps forward and Â§aStunsÂ§f enemies
hammer.spell.block: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nMagic Shield Â§7>Â§f When attacking, disables the shield and pushes back enemies
info.musee.weapons.bow: This bow is awesome! It will pierce anyone in its sight.
bow.spell.piercing: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nPiercing Shot Â§7>Â§f Pierces a number of targets equal to the spell level
bow.spell.punch: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nPunch Â§7>Â§f Propels enemies upon impact
bow.spell.rain: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nArrow Rain Â§7>Â§f Grants a chance to fire multiple arrows in one shot Â§7(Consumes quiver faster)Â§f
bow.spell.flame: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nFire Arrow Â§7>Â§f Grants a chance to shoot Â§afire arrowsÂ§f
bow.spell.storm: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nStorm Arrow Â§7>Â§f Summons a lightning bolt when using Â§athe last arrowÂ§f in the quiver
info.musee.weapons.firehand: The fire staff will leave nothing but ash and desolation behind you. Nice, isn't it?
firehand.spell.ballz: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nMeteor Â§7>Â§f Summons a meteorite at the targeted location dealing damage and applying the "Ignition" effect
firehand.spell.fireshot: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nFire Shot Â§7>Â§f Shoots a fireball dealing damage and applying the "Ignition" effect
firehand.spell.firecone: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nFire Cone Â§7>Â§f Projects a cone of fire in front of the player dealing damage and applying the "Ignition" effect to enemies hit
firehand.spell.firetouch: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nInflammable Â§7>Â§f Has a chance to inflict "Ignition" when hitting the target with the staff
firehand.spell.sticky: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nSticky Bomb Â§7>Â§f The fireball adheres to the terrain
info.musee.weapons.icehand: Nothing better than an ice staff to keep the distance between you and your enemies.
icehand.spell.iceshard: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nIce Shard Â§7>Â§f Summons an ice block at the targeted location dealing damage and applying the "Frost" effect
icehand.spell.snowball: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nSnowball Â§7>Â§f Shoots a snowball dealing damage and applying the "Frost" effect
icehand.spell.wall: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nIce Wall Â§7>Â§f Summons a wall of ice that slows enemies passing through it and applies the "Frost" effect to them
icehand.spell.ice_trail: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nIcy Trail Â§7>Â§f To keep the beers cool
icehand.spell.iceblock: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nIce Block Â§7>Â§f Engulfs the player in an ice block that makes them immune to damage and gradually heals them.
info.musee.weapons.heal_staff: The healing staff is your guardian angel. Whether for yourself or your teammates.
heal_staff.spell.healshot: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nHeal Â§7>Â§f Shoots a healing projectile at an ally. Can also be used on yourself
heal_staff.spell.shield: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nShield Â§7>Â§f Shoots a projectile that pierces allied targets, granting them a shield and dealing damage to the first enemy hit
heal_staff.spell.healpad: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nPotion Â§7>Â§f Places a potion on the ground that gains bonus effects over time
info.musee.weapons.summon_staff: The summoning scepter will assist you with versatility in all your battles.
summon_staff.spell.dogs: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nSummoning Â§7>Â§f Summons a loyal companion to aid you in combat
summon_staff.spell.fang: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nFangs Â§7>Â§f Summons a wave of sharpened jaws emerging from the ground
summon_staff.spell.totem_shoot: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nAggressive Totem Â§7>Â§f Summons a totem that shoots targeted arrow salvos
summon_staff.spell.totem_heal: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nHealing Totem Â§7>Â§f Summons a totem that heals group members within its radius
summon_staff.spell.totem_taunt: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nTaunting Totem Â§7>Â§f Summons a totem that draws all targets within its radius
info.musee.weapons.katana: The fine blade of this katana will leave no chance of survival for your opponents.

katana.spell.light_dash: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nJump Â§7>Â§f Jumps forward a short distance while Â§aincreasing speedÂ§f

katana.spell.dark_dash: Â§bÂ§lÂ§nDarkDash Â§7>Â§f Jumps forward a long distance but Â§creduces movementÂ§f
info.musee.armor.dragon: Draconic armor crafted from fiery scales.
info.musee.armor.berzerk: Nothing like gladiator armor to win your duels.
info.musee.armor.valkyrie: May the strength and courage of the valkyries accompany you on your adventures.

info.musee.armor.rogue: Nothing better than the assassin's outfit to sneak effortlessly among your enemies.
info.musee.raremobz:
Some creatures may wear a colored crown.
 This gives them special skills and characteristics. Learn to recognize them.

tuto.text.story.part2: Â§fI'm going to ask you to go pick up Â§aa carrotÂ§r and thus Â§bfeed RuruÂ§r.
tuto.text.story.part3: Â§fI'm opening the door for you, good luck.
tuto.text.story.part4: Â§fWell done! You have Â§athe carrotÂ§r, give it to Â§eRuruÂ§r by right-clicking on it.
tuto.text.story.part5: Â§fHe appreciates you!! Now, I need Â§aa berryÂ§r from the cemetery. Watch your step, a thorn can easily get you...
tuto.text.story.part6: Â§fOh no!! A skeleton! Strike it.
tuto.text.story.part7: Â§fWell done, but there are Â§dportalsÂ§r that have activated. Hurry to get Â§aequipment from the houseÂ§r.
tuto.text.story.part8:
Â§fYou have 3 items! 
 - Â§bA wooden swordÂ§r 
 - Â§bA parchmentÂ§r, just right-click with it in hand 
 - And Â§ba gemÂ§r that can be equipped in one of these 3 slots in the inventory   , Â§cBe careful not to remove it or it will break.Â§r

Return to the portals

Â§fGet ready to start Â§athe AltarÂ§r, as most of these structures are very dangerous! 
 And good luck with the rest.

game.tips.0:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Exit the ongoing game with the command: Â§6/trigger reset
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.1:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Scrolls can stack up to 10 times on each statistic
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.2:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: By default, you have a 3% chance of critical hit on your melee weapons
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.3:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Look for chests to find gems, armor, or any other consumable
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.4:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Useless trinkets? You can exchange them for gold coins by crouching
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.5:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Want to survive? Don't die.
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.6:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Save up for the Mystic Shop!
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.7:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Too hard? Reduce the difficulty at the lobby, or upgrade your weapons!
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.8:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Crowns, know them to avoid surprises
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.9:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Unknown gem? A little visit to the museum is in order (on the lobby floor)
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.10:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Complete armor sets for bonuses. And style!
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.11:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Watch out for bears
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.12:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Ruru the sheep loves carrots
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.13:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Have you found the sign room in the lobby? It's well hidden ;)
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.14:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Fire and ice make a powerful duo!
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.15:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Track your progress by collecting achievements
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.16:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Speedrun fan? You can find your best times in the lobby, in the library wing
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.17:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Have you finished the main story? Head to the village for the continuation of the adventure. An alternative game mode is to be unlocked
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.18:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Improve your damage by timing your attacks perfectly
Â§f     -----------------------
game.tips.19:
Â§a> TIP Â§f: Chain mobs, but remember that charged attacks provide a significant advantage
Â§f     -----------------------

game.mode_chaos.unlocked: Â§7[Â§6Game MasterÂ§7] Â§f: Â§eCongratulations, you have unlocked Chaos Mode, head to the library!

info.musee.puits.title: The Well (Doom Zone)
info.musee.puits.description: This well is a gateway to an alternate dimension. It is particularly dangerous, but if you survive, you will be greatly rewarded and will return to where you were.
info.musee.portal.title: The Portal
info.musee.portal.description: This portal is the only way to progress in your adventure. There is no turning back. Â§7(All players must be present)
